answers.answer: I went at 36 week's with first
A lotof FTM go 7-10 days overdue. It's not fool proof but I think you should be fine as long as you haven't had gestational diabetes or pre-eclampsia.

I believe the best time to do your shower would be when your 28 weeks. After the 7th month it is very possible for any women to go into labor i know a couple of friends who were only 7 months and had their babies and they were first time mothers.
Yes you can I did mines at 35 weeks
I was eleven days late with my first, as long as your pregnancy has been straightforward and you're feeling fine then you can just enjoy the pampering!
Is it safe? Lol what kind of baby shower are you having? :) I think you will be fine!

question: I'm a first time mom and just realized that i will actually be 38 weeks on the day of my shower im a little nervous and a tad bit scared. And my other question is have any first time moms went in to give birth early like before 40 or 42 weeks? Thanks
title: is it safe to have a baby shower at 38 weeks?
